title: [1.6.2][SSP/SMP]SuperGlass - 炒鸡玻璃mod！
author: wolski
txt_content:
本帖最后由 wolski 于 2013-7-30 01:58 编辑 

mod用途
给你的服务器添加各种玻璃，没装林业或觉得用途不够全可以考虑安装此MOD~

透视方块已在162版本被删除。

162变动！
平滑玻璃

荧光玻璃

彩色玻璃

玻璃楼梯

花纹玻璃&楼梯

黑曜石粉末


新增一种矿石
荧光矿石&荧光粉末


渲染BUG，162仍然存在
右图是高品质，左图是流畅。

合成表

Black Smooth Glass

Coloured Smooth Glass (Replace the dye with desired colour!)

Lumos Blocks (Replace the dye with desired colour, only certain ones are available)

Coloured Glass (Replace dye with desired colour, one for each dye in the game!)

Coloured Glass Stairs (Replace the glass with which every colour/kind of stairs you want).

Obsidian Dust

Hardened Glass
